column1: mute flip (mutes active and unmutes muted tracks);ctrl+shift+alt+D
auto-select playing clip-slot when selecting a track (toggle);shift+alt+ENTER
stop track (stops any clip playing on that track);ctrl+shift+RETURN
stop all tracks (stops all clips playing on all tracks);ctrl+shift+alt+RETURN
play (selection if any else from startmarker) / stop;alt+SPACE
